item.title: ADMM
item.description: scaled dual ADMM algorithm Given x, z and , to some initial value. Repeat: \(x:= \arg\max_{x}(f(x) + \frac{\rho}{2}\|Ax+Bz-c+\mu\|_2^2)\) \(x:= \arg\max_{x}(g(z) + \frac{\rho}{2}\|Ax+Bz-c+\mu\|_2^2)\) \(\mu:= \mu + (Ax + Bz - c)\) Stopping criterion : quit \(\|r\|_2<\epsilon\) and \(\|s\|_2<\epsilon\) Stopping criterion We can define the primal and dual residuals in ADMM at step k+1. * Primal residuals : \(r^{k+1} = Ax^{k+1} + Bz^{k+1} - c\)
